scripts.build:standalone:windows: npm run db:standalone:windows:client:generate && dotenv -e .env.standalone.windows -- next build && cp -r public .next/standalone/ && cp -r .next/static .next/standalone/.next/ && cp .env.standalone.windows .next/standalone/
scripts.db:standalone:windows:push: npm run db:standalone:windows:client:generate && dotenv -e .env.standalone.windows -- npm exec prisma db push
scripts.db:standalone:windows:init: npm run db:standalone:windows:client:generate && npm run db:standalone:windows:reset && npm run db:standalone:windows:push && npm run db:standalone:windows:seed
scripts.db:push:dev: npm run db:client:generate:dev && dotenv -e .env.development -- npm exec prisma db push
scripts.db:init:dev: npm run db:client:generate:dev && npm run db:reset:dev && npm run db:push:dev && npm run db:seed:dev
scripts.dev:build: npm run docker:compose:build:dev && npm run docker:compose:up:dev
scripts.dev:start: npm run docker:compose:up:dev && npm run dev
scripts.db:push:prod: npm run db:client:generate:prod && dotenv -e .env.production -- npm exec prisma db push
scripts.db:init:prod: npm run db:client:generate:prod && npm run db:reset:prod && npm run db:push:prod && npm run db:seed:prod
scripts.prod:build: npm run docker:compose:build:prod && npm run docker:compose:up:prod && npm run open:prod
scripts.prod:start: npm run docker:compose:up:prod && npm run open:prod
